tum.betriebsysteme.kostadinov.btframework.report
Class HIDReportMouse

java.lang.Object
  tum.betriebsysteme.kostadinov.btframework.report.HIDReport
      tum.betriebsysteme.kostadinov.btframework.report.HIDReportMouse
Direct Known Subclasses:
HIDReportMouseAbsolute, HIDReportMouseRelative
public abstract class HIDReportMouse
extends HIDReport

Both data reports of regular mouse and a pointer are implementing this pattern.

Author:
Nikolay Kostadinov
